text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the dawn
New day has begun
Leaving shadows behind
Chasing after the sun

[Verse 2]
Footprints on the sand
Holding your hand
Feel the world in our palms
Together we stand

[Chorus]
Oh sunrise dreams
In the light we gleam
Catch the morning glow
In our hearts we know

[Verse 3]
Dancing in the breeze
Among the trees
Whispering our love
To the sky above

[Chorus]
Oh sunrise dreams
In the light we gleam
Catch the morning glow
In our hearts we know

[Bridge]
Every moment here
Crystal clear
No more fears
Dried our tears
title: Sunrise Dreams
